item.title: Nataraj Ponnusamy
item.description: A chemistry professor and researched well-versed in tutoring students to qualify for international level chemistry olimpiads and IIT-JEE. He has a work experience of 15 years and running. In the past 2 years, he has managed to provide a student with silver medal International Chemistry Olympiad (ICHO) and also produced 4 students below rank of 50 in IIT-JEE.

item.title: Subba Rao
item.description: A physics professor, enterpreneur and researcher, is an experienced mentor for students persuing various physics olympiads and IIT-JEE. He has a work experience of 13 years and running. He has managed to produce studens with best ranks of 19 and 42 among under 50 in the past 3 years.

item.title: Mock test
item.description: IItians conduct aptitude, competative level examinations for students of class VI to XII. We sponsor them and support them in all technical ways and provide them with enough manpower to conduct these examinations. The registration fee set for each examination is Rs.100 and the following are the details of the examination:- 6th ,7th standards - aptitude examinations 8th ,9th standards - NSEJS 10th standard - NTSE 11th standard - KVPY-SA 12th standard - KVPY-SB

item.title: About Us
item.description: 4IITEENS is a highly competent institute for perfect coaching with a sole motive to guide students to get admission in top best Dream colleges/universities and world best colleges. Top three academicians from Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry decided to come together for a common purpose to provide a simplified systematic and sustainable coaching for IITJEE. IITJEE requires a very systematic preparation and it examines your basic concepts its logical aspects and your ability to apply fundamentals to multi-conceptual problems.
